amendatorysection.para: A city of the primary class shall have power to regulate, license, or prohibit the sale of domestic animals, goods, wares, and merchandise at public auction in the streets, alleys, highways, or any public grounds within the city, and to regulate or license the auctioneering of goods, wares, and merchandise. If the applicant is an individual, an application for a license shall include the applicant's social security number.
